input_args.passage: 'Rhys ap Tewdwr | Rhys ap Tewdwr (c. 1040 – 1093) was a king of Deheubarth in Wales and member of the Dinefwr dynasty, a branch descended from Rhodri the Great.'
input_args.claim: "Although this doesn't directly mention Tewdwr ap Peredur, it hints at the possibility that he might also have held a royal rank given the common naming convention."
